definition: to tremble/to shake out/to reveal/to make it in the world
to withdraw/to pull back/to contract/to shrink/to reduce/abbreviation/also pr. [su4]

sentences.english: The condemned prisoner cowered and began to whimper for clemency.
sentences.chinese: 那個被判罪的囚犯抖縮着並開始抽泣請求寬恕。

sentences.english: The dog cowered under the table when his master raised the whip.
sentences.chinese: 主人舉起鞭子時，狗在桌子下邊抖縮。
